name: Matching Christmas Card Memory Game
description:
MATCHING CHRISTMAS CARD MEMORY GAME….

* Christmas Card memory game for kids is the classic board game, which help develop memory skills of children.

* Playing this animals matching game with your kids will help them improve their recognition while having fun.

* Kids memory game contains very cute images of different Christmas Card, which are on memory cards.

* Christmas Card memory game is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. Both, boys and girls will love this game.

* It has been recently scientifically proven that regular mental and concentration exercise can greatly improve memory of kids.

How to play MATCHING CHRISTMAS CARD MEMORY GAME:

For each level, player is required to tap the square buttons and need to memorise what is behind it in order to match its couple. Players are required to complete a level in minimum finger taps to match all Christmas Crads

Features of MATCHING CHRISTMAS CARD MEMORY GAME:

- Three different levels of game play:
(2 x 2 puzzles), (2 x 3 puzzles), (2 x 4 puzzles), (3 x 4 puzzles),
(3 x 6 puzzles), (4 x 4 puzzles), (5 x 4 puzzles), (6 x 6 puzzles)

- Also above all are main levels.

- It’s 10 sub Levels of all main levels…

- Memory game develops recognition, concentration and motor skills of kid.

- Matching games has cute sounds for kids

- Colourful HD graphic designed for toddlers

- Sound settings to adjust or even on/off game sounds and music

- Visual memory training

- Matching game has get maximum star.

- It helps kids to recognise and teach different Christmas Cards

- Matching game is designed and structured according to kid's mentality

- Application may contains ads to keep it free.

- Also Learn Christmas Card Object Spellings.

* Simple and intuitive interface which is easy to use and easy to play, specially designed for children.

* Christmas Cards memory games for kids is also optimised for tablets (provide HD pictures).

* This free animals memory game for kids will keep your children quiet and entertained in car, in a restaurant or everywhere.

Have fun to play with our matching game!
